info.name: mathongo-backend
info.description:
This collection exercises the Chapter Dashboard backend. It contains three routes:

1. GET /chapters (list + filters + pagination)
    
2. GET /chapters/:id (retrieve a single chapter)
    
3. POST /chapters (bulk upload chapters JSON).
    

Use the `{{baseUrl}}` environment variable to switch between local and deployed URLs.

request.description:
**GET ALL CHAPTERS**  
  
Returns a paginated list of chapters. You may optionally filter by one or more of: `class`, `unit`, `status`, `isWeakChapter`, or `subject`.

- **Query Parameters**:  
      
    • `class` (string) — e.g. “Class 11”  
      
    • `unit` (string) — e.g. “Mechanics 1”  
      
    • `status` (string) — “Not Started” / “In Progress” / “Completed”  
      
    • `isWeakChapter` (boolean) — `true` or `false`  
      
    • `subject` (string) — e.g. “Mathematics”  
      
    • `page` (integer) — page number (default = 1)  
      
    • `limit` (integer) — items per page (default = 10)
    

- **Response JSON Schema**
    

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "count": <number of items in this page>,
  "total": <total chapters matching filters>,
  "page": <current page>,
  "pages": <total pages>,
  "data": [
    {
      "_id": "64f9a513b2e6f1e1a1c2e3d9",
      "subject": "Mathematics",
      "chapter": "Linear Equations",
      "class": "Class 10",
      "unit": "Unit 2",
      "yearWiseQuestionCount": { "2019": 12, "2020": 15, … },
      "questionSolved": 0,
      "status": "In Progress",
      "isWeakChapter": false,
      "createdAt": "2025-06-05T10:00:00.000Z",
      "updatedAt": "2025-06-05T10:00:00.000Z",
      "__v": 0
    },
    … more chapter objects …
  ]
}

 ```

**Example**:  
  
To get page 2 of Class 11 Physics chapters that are in progress, set params:

```
  class = Class 11  
  subject = Physics  
  status = In Progress  
  page = 2  
  limit = 5

 ```

request.description:
**GET CHAPTER BY ID**

Retrieves a single chapter document by its MongoDB `_id`.

- **Path Parameter**:
    
    • `id` (string, required) — MongoDB ObjectID of the chapter.
    

- **Response JSON Schema**:
    

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "_id": "…",
    "subject": "Mathematics",
    "chapter": "Linear Equations",
    "class": "Class 10",
    "unit": "Unit 2",
    "yearWiseQuestionCount": { … },
    "questionSolved": 0,
    "status": "In Progress",
    "isWeakChapter": false,
    "createdAt": "2025-06-05T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2025-06-05T10:00:00.000Z",
    "__v": 0
  }
}

 ```

- **404 Response** (when not found):
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Chapter not found"
}

 ```

**UPLOAD CHAPTERS (BULK)**

Accepts a single `.json` file containing an array of chapter objects. Each object must match the Chapter schema:

``` json
{
  "subject": "Mathematics",
  "chapter": "Linear Equations",
  "class": "Class 10",
  "unit": "Unit 2",
  "yearWiseQuestionCount": { "2019": 12, "2020": 15, … },
  "questionSolved": 0,
  "status": "In Progress",
  "isWeakChapter": false
}

 ```

- **File Field**: `file` (must be of MIME type `application/json`).
    
- **Response**:
    

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "insertedCount": <# valid docs>,
  "failedCount": <# invalid docs>,
  "errors": [
    { "index": 2, "errors": { … } },
    …
  ]
}

 ```

- **403 Response (if not “admin”):**
    

``` json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Unauthorized"
}


 ```
